tool_description: Executes account suspension with specified parameters, restrictions, and effective dates.

suspension_type.description: Type of suspension: temporary, permanent, conditional

duration_days.description: Suspension duration in days (0 for permanent or conditional)

error_messages: Account already suspended: Cannot suspend an account that is already in suspended status.
Invalid suspension type: Use one of [temporary, permanent, conditional].
Invalid duration: For temporary suspensions, duration_days must be greater than 0.
Insufficient authorization: User lacks permission to suspend accounts.
System lock failure: Unable to execute suspension due to system constraints.
usage: Provide account_id, suspension_type, and reason_code; for temporary suspensions, specify duration_days; set effective_immediately to false for delayed activation.

suspension_id.description: Unique identifier for this suspension action

status.description: Execution status: completed, failed, or pending

effective_date.description: Date and time when suspension became effective

expiration_date.description: Date when suspension expires (null for permanent)

restrictions_applied.description: List of restrictions now active on the account
